os.fullpath: Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: Windows 7

name: Windows7 OEM Activator
short_description: This software is made for make it easy to enable the SLIC license that exist in the Motherboard instead of need to type in the commands for "install" the product key and after that install the certification file this help the user with that. Just create a Directory in the the dir where the exe and name it Slic and in that dir make a dir with Brand name or what you want, in that dir you can have directory named 2.1/2.0 or both. In say dir 2.1 you just have the certification file and the software is ready for use. Just then execute the exe file, select the brand, certification file and input the oem key and hit the Activation button and you are done ;). PS! No OEM key or certification file will ever be included if you have the right to install SLIC license you have the certification file.
